name: PersonalData.IO
goal:
Our goals are:
- Increase awareness of issues relating to personal data and their use;
- Ease the exercise of data protection rights;
- Increase awareness of collective dimension of those issues;
- Ease the exercise of data protection rights collectively;
- Partner with other initiatives going into those directions.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
- personal data
- GDPR
- free trade around data
- data justice
- algorithmic accountability
- algorithmic transparency
- antitrust issues in digital world
